BG3 Staff of Spell Power Location & Where to Find

Location: In the House of Hope in a vault behind a hidden door. (Near the entrance to the Boudoir. A DC10 Wisdom check is required to activate the Inert Infernal Gem and then a DC20 Arcana check to open the door.)
